title: Priyesh Shukla on insect-sized drones and life on the Edge
description: IIITH’s Prof. Priyesh Shukla, a Ph.D from the University of Illinois talks about exciting work on insect-sized drones and life on the Edge. He brings youthful energy and industrial R&D experience to his work in sustainable AI and Quantum Computing Systems at IIITH’s Center for VLSI and Embedded Systems Technology and Computer Systems Group.
author: Prof. Priyesh Shukla
